item.title: Finite state machines in puppet
item.description: In my attempt to push puppet to its limits, (for no particular reason), to develop more powerful puppet modules, to build in a distributed lock manager, and to be more dynamic, I’m now attempting to build a Finite State Machine (FSM) in puppet. Is this a real finite state machine, and why would you do this? Computer science professionals might not approve of the purity level, but they will hopefully appreciate the hack value.
